basics.name: Accountant
basics.label: Accounting Professional
basics.summary: Accountant with more than 8 years accounting experience with profit making, non for profit and non-governmental organizations (NGOs). Possess solid knowledge of GAAP, GASB and IFRS. Proficient in automated systems: such as QuickBooks, Sun system and Peachtree Accounting.

work.name: Unknown Company
work.summary: Responsible for account coding accuracy Record, and reconcile Accounts Payables on a monthly basis... All department processes and procedures documented and the appropriate individual(s) trained and cross-trained as necessary.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Delegated Finance and Admin Manager and Finance Officer
work.summary: Prepared standardize monthly, quarterly, biannual and annual finances and review overall financial reports and follow up financial status... Participated in proposal budgeting when new projects are initiated.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Produced periodic financial reports for both internal (organization) and external use (donors & government) and interpret and analyze the reports... Controlled staff benefits like; insurance, medical, PF etc.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Ensured that financial transactions are recorded as per the chart of accounts... Make ready financial documents for internal & external audit.
